title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync error
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync error (1GILQD5)
OB: When the user exports a directory (project) and places the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The software should not display an out of sync message when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
SR:
1. Open a project directory.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same project directory.
4. Attempt to overwrite the exported jar file by exporting the directory again.
